name: Viki Spotter: Camping
description: An exciting puzzle game about finding differences. Compare the pictures and try to find everything that they differ from each other.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
